trans-unit.source: Instructs the <see cref="T:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer" /> not to serialize the public field or public read/write property value.
trans-unit.target: Instruye al <see cref="T:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer" /> para que no serialice el valor de campo público o propiedad pública de lectura/escritura.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapIgnoreAttribute> class belongs to a family of attributes that controls how the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer> serializes or deserializes an object as encoded SOAP XML.
trans-unit.target: El <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapIgnoreAttribute> clase pertenece a una familia de atributos que controla cómo el <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer> serializa o deserializa un objeto como XML SOAP codificado.

trans-unit.source: The resulting XML conforms to section 5 of the World Wide Web Consortium (www.w3.org) document, "Simple Object Access Protocol (SOAP) 1.1".
trans-unit.target: El XML resultante se ajusta a la sección 5 del documento Consorcio WWC (www.w3.org), "Simple Object Access Protocol (SOAP) 1.1".

trans-unit.source: For a complete list of similar attributes, see [Attributes That Control Encoded SOAP Serialization](~/docs/standard/serialization/attributes-that-control-encoded-soap-serialization.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obtener una lista completa de atributos similares, vea [atributos que controlan la serialización SOAP codificada](~/docs/standard/serialization/attributes-that-control-encoded-soap-serialization.md).

trans-unit.source: To serialize an object as an encoded SOAP message, you must construct the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer> using an <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlTypeMapping> created with the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapReflectionImporter.ImportTypeMapping%2A> method of the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapReflectionImporter> class.
trans-unit.target: Para serializar un objeto como un mensaje SOAP codificado, se debe crear el <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer> con una <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlTypeMapping> creado con la <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapReflectionImporter.ImportTypeMapping%2A> método de la <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapReflectionImporter> clase.

trans-unit.source: Apply the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapIgnoreAttribute> to any class member that you want the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer> to ignore when an instance of the class is serialized.
trans-unit.target: Aplicar el <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapIgnoreAttribute> a cualquier miembro de clase que desea que el <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer> para pasar por alto cuando se serializa una instancia de la clase.

trans-unit.source: For example, you may do this when the member is used to contain metadata about the object being serialized.
trans-unit.target: Por ejemplo, puede hacerlo cuando se utiliza el miembro que contiene los metadatos sobre el objeto que se está serializando.

trans-unit.source: For more information about using attributes, see [Attributes](~/docs/standard/attributes/index.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obtener más información sobre el uso de atributos, vea [atributos](~/docs/standard/attributes/index.md).

trans-unit.source: You can use the word `SoapIgnore` in your code instead of the longer <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapIgnoreAttribute>.
trans-unit.target: Puede usar la palabra `SoapIgnore` en el código en lugar de la forma más larga <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapIgnoreAttribute>.

trans-unit.source: The following example serializes a class named `Group`.
trans-unit.target: En el ejemplo siguiente se serializa una clase denominada `Group`.

trans-unit.source: The serialization of the `GroupName` and `IgnoreThis` fields and the members of the `GroupType` enumeration are overridden.
trans-unit.target: La serialización de la `GroupName` y `IgnoreThis` campos y los miembros de la `GroupType` se reemplaza la enumeración.

trans-unit.source: In the `CreateOverrideSerializer` method, a <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributeOverrides> is created, and for each overridden member or enumeration, a <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributes> is created with the appropriate property set and added to the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributeOverrides>.
trans-unit.target: En el `CreateOverrideSerializer` método, un <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributeOverrides> está creada y cada miembro reemplazado o enumeración, un <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributes> se crea con la correspondiente propiedad establecida y agregada a la <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributeOverrides>.

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlTypeMapping> is created using the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributeOverrides>, and that <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlTypeMapping> is used to create the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer> that overrides the default serialization.
trans-unit.target: Un <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlTypeMapping> se crea utilizando el <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributeOverrides>y que <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlTypeMapping> se utiliza para crear el <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer> que invalida la serialización predeterminada.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapIgnoreAttribute" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa una nueva instancia de la clase <see cref="T:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapIgnoreAttribute" />.

trans-unit.source: The following example serializes a class named `Group`.
trans-unit.target: En el ejemplo siguiente se serializa una clase denominada `Group`.

trans-unit.source: The serialization of the `GroupName` and `IgnoreThis` fields and the members of the `GroupType` enumeration are overridden.
trans-unit.target: La serialización de la `GroupName` y `IgnoreThis` campos y los miembros de la `GroupType` se reemplaza la enumeración.

trans-unit.source: In the `CreateOverrideSerializer` method, a <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributeOverrides> is created, and for each overridden member or enumeration, a <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributes> is created with the appropriate property set and added to the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributeOverrides>.
trans-unit.target: En el `CreateOverrideSerializer` método, un <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributeOverrides> está creada y cada miembro reemplazado o enumeración, un <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributes> se crea con la correspondiente propiedad establecida y agregada a la <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributeOverrides>.

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlTypeMapping> is created using the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributeOverrides>, and that <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlTypeMapping> is used to create the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer> that overrides the default serialization.
trans-unit.target: Un <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlTypeMapping> se crea utilizando el <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributeOverrides>y que <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlTypeMapping> se utiliza para crear el <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer> que invalida la serialización predeterminada.
